title: City of Sydney DA Explained: Challenges, Delays, and Solutions - Upscale Project Management
metaDescription: City of Sydney DA approvals are slow, rigid, and costly, driving up housing prices. Learn how to navigate the process. Call 02 9090 4480 today.
h1: City of Sydney DA Explained: Challenges, Delays, and Solutions
bodyTextPreview: City of Sydney DA Explained: Challenges, Delays, and Solutions Why the City of Sydney DA Process Is Failing Developers — and Buyers The City of Sydney DA (Development Application) process is meant to balance good design, planning compliance, and community needs. In practice, however, it has become a drawn-out, rigid, and costly system that is deterring developers, adding years of delays, and inflating housing prices. A recent case highlights just how challenging the process has become. View this

It’s a question I get asked all the time — and the short answer is no . Tender evaluation is about a lot more than price. It’s about risk, capability, compliance, and value. The type of construction contract you choose is one of the most important decisions you’ll make in a project. At some point, you want to essentially freeze that design —because making changes once construction has started costs time, money, and sometimes goodwill. bodyTextPreview: Insights into Floor Space Ratio Floor Space Ratio: Why It’s More Complex Than Just the Numbers Walk past a small development site in Sydney and you’ll often hear people say, “Great, I’ll max out the FSR and push the height limit.” It sounds logical—after all, floor space ratio (FSR) is one of the key planning controls used by councils to determine how much building you can put on a site. h1: Ground Anchors and License Access Deeds
bodyTextPreview: Ground Anchors and License Access Deeds Understanding Ground Anchors and Licence Access Deeds in Sydney Developments Deep basement excavations are a hallmark of modern Sydney construction. Whether it’s a new apartment building, a commercial tower, or a mixed-use project, sites are often tight and developers need to dig several levels below ground. To do this safely, they rely on ground anchors —a critical but often misunderstood element of construction. Yet ground anchors don’t just raise engine

bodyTextPreview: Client Side Project Management Sydney What Is Client-Side Project Management? When people hear the term project management , they often think of a broad skill set that applies across many industries. From IT to marketing, manufacturing to healthcare, project managers keep things moving, solve problems, and ensure outcomes are delivered. But in property and construction, the role of a client-side project manager (PM) is both unique and critical. Unlike a builder’s project manager, who represents
